citations.narrative:
The licensee has conducted activities not authorized by a Class-A License. During inspection, disposition documents
showed that on 5/18/2023 10 weeper capuchins were sold to another licensed facility. These animals were bought and
resold thus constituting brokering. Another disposition document showed that four servals and four caracals were sold on
7-26-2023 to another licensed facility. These cats were breeding stock and not born on site.
Licenses are issued to specific persons, and are issued for specific activities, types and numbers of animals, and
approved sites. A new license must be obtained upon change of ownership, location, activities, or animals. A licensee
shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change in the name, address,
management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or type of
animal(s). A Class-B license must be obtained before any sale of animals that were not born and raised at the facility.
Correct by Sept. 30, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee has conducted activities not authorized by a Class-A License. During inspection, disposition documents 
showed that on 5/18/2023 10 weeper capuchins were sold to another licensed facility. These animals were bought and 
resold thus constituting brokering. Another disposition document showed that four servals and four caracals were sold on 
7-26-2023 to another licensed facility. These cats were breeding stock and not born on site. 
 
Licenses are issued to specific persons, and are issued for specific activities, types and numbers of animals, and 
approved sites. A new license must be obtained upon change of ownership, location, activities, or animals. A licensee 
shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change in the name, address, 
management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or type of 
animal(s). A Class-B license must be obtained before any sale of animals that were not born and raised at the facility.  
 
Correct by Sept. 30, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
